sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Website, SaaS, Web3, Blockchain Development Team
sellerCard.description: Hello, I'm a Fullstack developer with over 8 years of professional experience in Website Design, Website Applications, Landing Pages, E-commerce, SaaS, management systems, and more. My skills include PHP, Laravel, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Tailwind, JavaScript, jQuery, VueJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, GitHub, PSD to HTML, and experience with VPS server, Shared Hosting, source code deployment. In addition, web3js and Smart Contracts are also my strengths. If you're unsure how to begin building your website, please feel free to contact me via inbox to get started.

description.content:
Welcome to my GIG.


I'm a professional website developer and expert in JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, and NestJS with more than 8 years of freelancing experience.


Why choose us?

  • Expert in website design and development with years of experience.
  • High quality, affordable, and work until satisfaction.
  • Finish the product in the fastest time.
  • 100% customer satisfaction.
  • Unlimited Revisions, best in the price range.


My Services:

  • Fix or develop the website.
  • Customize web applications or addition of new features to existing websites.
  • Develop the website from scratch in JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS, and Vercel including powerful CMS.
  • Responsive design with any device.
  • SEO, optimize with Google Page Speed.


My Skills:

  • HTML5 and CSS3.
  • JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS.
  • NodeJS, ExpressJS, NestJS.
  • Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, and other CSS frameworks.
  • Smoothly deploy projects to Vercel, AWS.
  • MySQL, MongoDB.


Please contact if you need further explanation on packages. I will help you choose the best fit for you.


Available for custom orders!


NOTE: Inbox me before placing any orders. Special discounts and offers especially for the repeat buyer!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the process of fixing bugs or developing a website using ReactJS or NextJS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The process of fixing bugs or developing a website using ReactJS or NextJS involves several steps such as requirement gathering, designing, development, testing, and deployment. We follow an agile methodology to ensure that the development process is smooth and efficient.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What are the technologies that you use to fix bugs or develop websites using ReactJS or NextJS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We use the latest technologies such as ReactJS, NextJS, and Redux to fix bugs or develop websites. We also ensure that the technology stack is scalable and secure.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to fix bugs or develop a website using ReactJS or NextJS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The time to fix bugs or develop a website using ReactJS or NextJS depends on the complexity of the project. We provide a detailed timeline after analyzing the requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the cost of fixing bugs or developing a website using ReactJS or NextJS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The cost of fixing bugs or developing a website using ReactJS or NextJS depends on the features and complexity of the project. We provide a detailed quote after analyzing the requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the level of support that you provide after the delivery of the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide a high level of support after the delivery of the website. We offer maintenance, bug fixing, and feature enhancements to ensure that the website is up-to-date and running smoothly.

reviews.comment: For more than a year, we’ve relied on him for various tasks, and he continues to impress us with his exceptional work ethic and dedication. Whether it's handling website updates or resolving issues, he’s always available and approaches everything with care and a clear understanding of our needs. A true professional and someone we trust completely for ongoing collaboration!

We've been working with him for over a year now, and that's not without reason. He always delivers excellent work and consistently exceeds our expectations. Reliable, professional, and always willing to go the extra mile. A fantastic person to work with, and we're happy to continue to work with him.

Over and over again, this guy does what it takes to complete exactly what I was asking for. Happy to have him. He is quick and understands exactly what we want to have on our website. Very good! 5 stars!
He finished very quickly. I'm very satisfied.
Highly recommend for anyone looking for a website developer
